backend/main.mo: Defines Motoko canister with product, order, user, category, and storage models plus admin/user authorization and category CRUD logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing an update to highlight the Admin Panel button and listing affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing routing, components, hooks, and UI behavior.
frontend/index.css: Minimal CSS file containing only Tailwind base, components, and utilities directives.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document loading the React app via main.tsx with a single root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling routing, authentication, admin access control, and cart management.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component showing store info, contact details, and sitemap links with role-based visibility.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with navigation, authentication controls, cart drawer, and a highlighted deep pink Admin Panel button for admins.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting first-time users to enter their name and save their profile via backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/storefront/Categ: Renders a category selection grid with icons, including an 'All' option and dynamically generated category buttons.
frontend/src/components/storefront/Produ: Displays a product card with image, details, optional offer badge, and actions for view, add to cart, and buy now.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useHashRoute.ts: Tracks the current route using the URL hash and updates on hash changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, including login, logout, status tracking, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, admin checks, categories, and products using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS layers and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, providing Internet Identity and React Query context providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminAccessBlockedPag: Shows a restricted-access page prompting login or redirecting home if user lacks admin privileges.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin dashboard with tabs for managing products and orders, including forms and dialogs for CRUD operations.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Checkout form for submitting delivery details and creating an order from cart items.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Storefront landing page showing featured content, categories, and product listings with filtering.
frontend/src/pages/MyOrdersPage.tsx: Displays the logged‑in user's past orders with status badges and order details.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Simple 404 page with a message and button to return home.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Product details view with images, videos, quantity selection, and add‑to‑cart or buy‑now actions.
frontend/src/utils/hashRoutes.ts: Utility functions for parsing, building, and navigating hash‑based app routes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL and hash params, persisting them in sessionStorage, and removing sensitive values from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with extended colors, typography, container settings, and custom font and size definitions.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including feature requests and notes about improving visibility of the Admin Panel button.
